languages.text: "Или — попросим {mf|господина|госпожу} фон Валанциус решить вопрос именем своей династии. Это Футфол, в конце концов. Если {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} скажет, что сервитор может быть наследником — так и будет".

"Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."
languages.original_text: "Или — попросим {mf|господина|госпожу} фон Валанциус решить вопрос именем своей династии. Это Футфол, в конце концов. Если {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} скажет, что сервитор может быть наследником — так и будет".

traits.locale_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a Rogue Trader says that a Servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

"Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a Rogue Trader says that a Servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

"Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a Rogue Trader says that a Servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

"Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a Rogue Trader says that a Servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

"Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

languages.text: “或者，我们也可以要求冯·瓦兰修斯大人以{mf|他|她}的王朝的名义来解决这个问题。毕竟这里是落脚港，如果{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}说机仆可以继承遗产，那就可以。”
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: “或者，我们也可以要求冯·瓦兰修斯大人以{mf|他|她}的王朝的名义来解决这个问题。毕竟这里是落脚港，如果{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}说奴工可以继承遗产，那就可以。”

languages.text: «O... podríamos pedirle a {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius que resuelva la disputa en nombre de su dinastía. Esto es Paso, al fin y al cabo. Si un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} dice que los servidores pueden heredar, esa es la ley».
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: «O... podríamos pedirle a {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius que resuelva la disputa en nombre de su dinastía. Esto es Paso, al fin y al cabo. Si un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} dice que los servidores pueden heredar, esa es la ley».

languages.text: 「それか…{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウスに、{mf|彼|彼女}の王朝の名において本件を解決するように頼むこともできる。ここはフットフォールです。サーヴィターも相続人になれると{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が言えば、それで決まりです」
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: 「それか…{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウスに、{mf|彼|彼女}の王朝の名において本件を解決するように頼むこともできる。ここはフットフォールです。サーヴィターも相続人になれると{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が言えば、それで決まりです」

languages.text: "Oder ... wir bitten {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, die Angelegenheit im Namen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie zu regeln. Das hier ist schließlich Footfall. Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sagt, dass ein Servitor erben kann – dann wird das so gehandhabt."
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: "Oder ... wir bitten {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, die Angelegenheit im Namen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Dynastie zu regeln. Das hier ist schließlich Footfall. Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} sagt, dass ein Servitor erben kann – dann wird das so gehandhabt."

languages.text: « Autrement... nous pourrions demander {mf|au seigneur|à la dame} von Valancius de trancher la question au nom de sa dynastie. Après tout, nous sommes à Castel. Si {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g} dit qu'un servitor peut hériter, alors il en sera ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: « Autrement... nous pourrions demander {mf|au seigneur|à la dame} von Valancius de trancher la question au nom de sa dynastie. Après tout, nous sommes à Castel. Si {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g} dit qu'un servitor peut hériter, alors il en sera ainsi. »

languages.text: "Ya da {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius'tan bu durumu kendi hanedanlığı adına çözmesini de rica edebiliriz. Burası Binliman sonuçta. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, hizmetörün miras alabileceğini söylüyorsa öyle olur."
languages.original_text: "Or — we could ask {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius to settle the matter in the name of {mf|his|her} dynasty. This is Footfall, after all. If a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} says that a servitor can inherit — then that's how it's going to be."

traits.locale_text: "Ya da {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius'tan bu durumu {mf|kendi|kendi} hanedanlığı adına çözmesini isteyebiliriz. Burası Binliman sonuçta. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}, servitörün miras alabileceğini söylüyorsa öyle olur."
